meaningMnemonic: You've learned that you can <radical>catapult</radical> things to <kanji>give</kanji> them to other people! Don't catapult rocks at buildings and walls, catapult gifts to the people you love.
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Give</kanji> food to your new friend <reading>Go</reading>dzilla (ご) with the catapult! You and Godzilla understand each other now. He's just hungry.
